software.description:
The shared dataset consists of T1, FLAIR, and DTI images for 24 Temporal Lobe Epilepsy (TLE) patients along with their clinical description as described in the following:

1- T1
2- FLAIR
3- Diffusion Tensor Imaging (DTI)
4- Apparent Diffusion Coefficient (ADC)

The T1 folder includes the following image sets:
1- Skull-Stripped T1 images
2- Manually segmented hippocampi
3- Brain segmented regions by FreeSurfer

The FLAIR folder includes:
1- Skull-Stripped FLAIR
2- Skull-Stripped T1 co-registered to the FLAIR
3- Manually segmented hippocampi co-registered to the FLAIR

The DTI folder includes the following image sets:
1- Diffusion Weighted Images (DWIs)
2- Fractional Anisotropy (FA)
3- Apparent Diffusion Coefficient (ADC)
4- Axial and radial diffusivity maps (AD & RD)
5- Geometry Shapes and the Eigen Value images of the tensor

The ADC folder includes:
1- ADC map images
2- Skull-Stripped T1 co-registered to the ADC map.
3- Manually segmented hippocampi co-registered to the ADC map.
